message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
